body:
I put here how to reproduce the problem: 
$ rails new postgres_clone -d postgresql
$ cd postgres_clone
$ rails generate migration my_migration
Edit migration and add: ```ruby #db/migrate/20110621212539_my_migration.rb class MyMigration < ActiveRecord::Migration def up connection.execute 'CREATE SCHEMA z_schema;' connection.execute 'CREATE TABLE z_schema.table1 (id integer, name varchar[255]);' connection.execute 'CREATE UNIQUE INDEX unique_table1_name ON z_schema.table1 USING btree (name);' end end ``` And then run: 
$ rake db:create
$ rake db:migrate
$ rake db:test:clone_structure

psql:/home/juan/projects/postgres_clone/db/development_structure.sql:75: ERROR:  relation "schema_migrations" does not exist
LÍNEA 1: INSERT INTO schema_migrations (version) VALUES ('20110621212...
